article_title: Blue Cross Blue Shield drops HMO plans in 11 counties
article_text: Success! An email has been sent with a link to confirm list signup.

article_metadata.author: Alex DixonHerald-Sun

og.description: Blue Cross and Blue Shield of North Carolina will drop its Blue Medicare HMO standard and Blue Medicare HMO Enhanced plan products in 11 North Carolina counties in 2015, affecting
